name: School Sector
description: An education app that provides courses and curriculums that students can enroll in. Students will be able to check their enrollments and statuses.

name: Monster Hunter World Builder
description: An equipment builder app for Monster Hunter: World players. Users can create builds that shows stats and can share it with the community

name: Zephyr Node
description: A productivity app that helps organize their notes, to-dos, reminders, and flashcard decks. Its unique feature is giving users the option to send reminders and flashcards as text messages.
